mapper.select: SELECT * FROM goods AS g JOIN lodgingdetail AS l ON g.goodsId = l.goodsId WHERE g.uid = #{uid}
SELECT * FROM goods AS g JOIN ticketdetail AS t ON g.goodsId = t.goodsId WHERE g.uid = #{uid}
mapper.insert: insert into goodreview(uid, goodsId, content, score, userName) values(#{uid}, #{goodsId}, #{content}, #{score}, #{userName})
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET score = (score + #{score})/2 WHERE goodsId = #{goodsId}
mapper.insert: insert into goods(goodsId, uid, goodsName, goodsPrice, goodsMainCategory, goodsInfo, goodsImageFileName, companyName, goodsCount) values(#{goodsId}, #{uid}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsMainCategory}, #{goodsInfo}, #{goodsImageFileName}, #{companyName}, #{goodsCount})

insert into lodgingdetail(goodsId, lodgingType, numOfTourist, checkIn, checkOut, bedAmount, swimmingPool, parking, spar, wifi, TV, airConditioner, refrigerator, restaurant, hotSpring, breakfast, hairAppliance, petsAllowed, store, disabledAccessibility, goodsStart, goodsEnd, goodsSubCategory, singleBed, doubleBed, twinBed, ondol) values(#{goodsId}, #{lodgingType}, #{numOfTourist}, #{checkIn}, #{checkOut}, #{bedAmount}, #{swimmingPool}, #{parking}, #{spar}, #{wifi}, #{TV}, #{airConditioner}, #{refrigerator}, #{restaurant}, #{hotSpring}, #{breakfast}, #{hairAppliance}, #{petsAllowed}, #{store}, #{disabledAccessibility}, #{goodsStart}, #{goodsEnd}, #{goodsSubCategory}, #{singleBed}, #{doubleBed}, #{twinBed}, #{ondol})
insert into orders(orderSeqNum, goodsId, uid, ordererName, ordererPhoneNumber, QA1, QA2, QA3) values(#{orderSeqNum}, #{goodsId}, #{uid}, #{ordererName}, #{ordererPhoneNumber}, #{QA1}, #{QA2}, #{QA3})

insert into touristinfo(touristNum, ordersNO, touristName, touristGender, touristPhoneNumber, touristBirth) values(#{touristNum}, #{ordersNO}, #{touristName}, #{touristGender}, #{touristPhoneNumber}, #{touristBirth})
insert into ticketdetail(goodsId, guide, goodsSubCategory, goodsStart, goodsEnd) values(#{goodsId}, #{guide}, #{goodsSubCategory}, #{goodsStart}, #{goodsEnd})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM goodsliked WHERE goodsId = #{goodsId} AND uid = #{uid}
mapper.select: UPDATE goods SET likedCnt = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM goodsliked WHERE goodsId = #{goodsId}) WHERE goodsId = #{goodsId}
mapper.update: UPDATE goods SET score = #{score} WHERE goodsId = #{goodsId}
